page.title: 19EMPLOYMENT C. CROOKHAM
page.content: In Linkway the female hairdresser has been there for 12 years, before that there was another hairdressers shop. The boss is called Brenda Rook, she chose that shop because she likes hairdressing. We found that the most popular hairstyle was a bob,because as it was short it was cool. Whilst you were having your hair done you were asked if you wanted a cup of coffee which was 40p.The staff had to bring their own hairdrier.CHARGES, Wet trims were Â£3.50, dry Â£2.50.,cut and blow dry Â£8 .60.The busiest day is Friday, (Record, 56 customers once).The shop is open at 9,00am to 5.30pm on Fridays, 9.00am to 7.00pm all other days ,except Sundays when it is closed. There are 12 people working there and an hour is taken off for dinner.
